::Prowl/Zardus::

Prowl grins as he hears Iron Raptor's comment, looking into her optics and 
once again distracted from the ground, which was rushing rather quickly up at 
him. He opens his mouth to reply, a second before they hit the ground.

There are several snapping sounds as Prowl is thrown a few feet, rolling into 
a boulder as several shots from Nemesis barely miss him. He groans. He was 
used to crashing, as any flying warrior probably is, but he had never before 
crashed with his girlfriend in his arms and a hole from a 45 foot tall 
gestalt's optic blast in his wing. This wasn't a bad crash, only a snapped 
wing and several broken ribs resulting from it.

He opens his eyes and looks at Iron Raptor, wondering why she was looking at 
him in a concerned way. Prowl stands up, using the boulder he had rolled into 
for support and wincing as he moved his broken ribs.

"I'm fine," he say in responce to Iron Raptor's hand reaching out for him, "A 
few broken bones is all. You allright?"

He looks over to Octociz, who had just run up to them. "Is the battle over?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus grins as he sees Prowl and Iron Raptor crash, and the Oblitercon 
situation resolve itself. He flies over to Nemesis.

"Let's get out of here. The maximals will have a good time repairing, I'm 
sure."

"Arcangle," he says into his comm-link, sending the message to the maximal, 
"I will return to base and scan for whatever you have detected."

Zardus turns, flying off toward the alliance base. "All Alliance units, 
return to base," he says to the Alliance over his comm-link.
